name: lender
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone or something that lends money, especially a large financial organization such as a bank: The smaller local lenders charge high interest rates.

Add to word list
a person or business, such as a bank, that lends money
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bank or other financial organization that lends money that is then paid back with interest: Lenders are in no mood to take risks.a big/large/major lender Major lenders were criticized for not passing on interest rate cuts. See also
mortgage lender
